title: Nami for Katey
body:
So, our sweet gal Riot KateyKhaos is about to get married in some hours.

Since she was always active in these boards and since she is a Nami lover, why not celebrate this with a Nami thread?

Thing is simple - spam Nami fanart. Nami pictures, Nami skin concepts, Nami comics... wathever you like! {{champion:267}} 
If you want, draw one of your own! You can' t draw? Then MSpaint and a mouse is more than enough. You forgot how to draw Nami and you draw Yorick or Urgoth instead? Doooooooon' t worry, it' s the thought that counts ;)

And all the best whishes to Kathelyn :)
 ( or so i suppose it is written )

picture from https://twitter.com/jinsyarara

 https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CsZ4RL0UMAAEZ8H.jpg

replies.body:
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/409/489/a0f.jpg

Am I doing this right?
The water checks it out

I don't take any credit for any of these pictures ;)

http://www.pcgamesn.com/sites/default/files/league-of-legends-nami_0.jpg

http://static.zerochan.net/Nami.(League.of.Legends).full.1769010.jpg

And my personal favorite:

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/4a/Nami_Poro_Icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150215130430

The second one is gorgeous \*_\*

Still, poro nami is best poro
You mean poro nami best nami?
OuO HOLY CRAP, you guys are awesome! This seriously made my day! Thank you so, so much, everyone! <3
Welcome back!
KATEYYYYYY :3

The thread is not closed yet, while it might be a tad necroed you are still free to contribute :)

also dat mastery
Glad you like this and welcome back! :3

So, since i did not draw that gorgeus piece of art that you see in the main post i wanted to contribute more personally

http://i.imgur.com/lszWwPS.jpg

Don't worry guys and gals, if you have capable hands you can surely do better than this xD

Oooh didn't know Katey was getting married! congrats to her then!

[](http://imgur.com/a/ee4on)

I tried, don't judge xd First I tried making Nami but I realized I had no time so I tried to make Poro Nami. Then I realized I screwed up majorly so I tried to make her into a truck... then i accidentally used a paint bucket and made the entire thing red so to try to counter it i just made it all black xd
http://imgur.com/a/ee4on
This speaks to me on a spiritual level
Thank you
It's just Really, Really, Really Deep Sea Nami. :3
ROFL, oh my god. This honestly makes me love it even more.
Thank you, it's my best XD

https://images.duckduckgo.com/iur/?f=1&image_host=http%3A%2F%2Ffc08.deviantart.net%2Ffs70%2Fi%2F2013%2F225%2F0%2F1%2Fnami__league_of_legends__by_wivimon-d6hy5i2.png&u=http://img10.deviantart.net/8f52/i/2013/225/0/1/nami__league_of_legends__by_wivimon-d6hy5i2.png

Oh did not know they sold water bottles on the rift.

Because that blue pot it is just water, right?
Brb, fa~~~~----- making fanart. I post one later, I just needa draw it first
get your time, channel your inner dankiness

It's all been channeled... and from my nice, long winded session, I spewed out this:

http://imgur.com/a/0UADE

Sorry it's lame, but I cba to do anything really detailed right now. I'm super lazy. This all you getting out of meh.
actually the lines avre very nice :O thanks for your contribution {{champion:161}}

I have a "jhin only account" on EUNE which is currently plat5, and playing together with a nami-only support main.
This comic describe us:
http://i.imgur.com/Sk66zD2.png
I wish the same experience for all fellow botlane premades/friends.
Because it's my support who carry me to the point where i can carry.
#Praise the nami supports.
And an extra:
http://i.imgur.com/oX2MXbM.jpg
Never underestimate a nami.
urge to sex fish rises.
Please leave that to the husband and don' t discuss further >_>
We mean the actual Nami xD
Oddly enough, I drew a 0-reference Nami a few days ago...maybe I should put it up for this instead of minor RP

i guess you can do both, honestly :)

i mean i doubt they will bother pointing that out if you use this for this reason, even thought that' s just imho.
Also, that Nami of yours is just epic, the color scheme seems to fit well

... ok this is embarassing. that is not my nami, i put the link under the picture for reference! (EDIT: i moved it above the picture so it is more visible)

I can only whish to be that good at drawing xD i did nothing by myself because i wanted to post something quickly, since i had this idea few minutes ago and she is getting married in a matter of minutes, so i hoped to get enough attenction so the thread would get populated enough for her.

should i share my own awkward drawing skills? so be it.

Anyone can draw, but if you want to shine you gotta want to draw well :3
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Stop right there, you had me at Nami.

http://jeddy017-vz.deviantart.com/art/Quick-Nami-Sketch-636646835?ga_submit_new=10%253A1474876033

Here you go, a simple sketch.
You are da fish! Thanks :D

I'm here to ruin this thread

Fish titties
Titaes*
Holy, I just noticed that in my last hextech champion re-roll I got nami, is this a gift from Katey?
Kathey ascent to godhood of Hextech confirmed
Urgoth? Can we get a skin for that?

Sorry I'm late,

I brought material.
Nice!
Will edit this comment with a link when I finish up a Nami piece <3 Super happy for Riot KateyKhaos!

Here's a pretty neat Nami skin concept, Sweet Heart Nami. Her q would be something like a big pink heart in the water, the w would be maybe something like pink water, or maybe have some Cupids in normal Water. Her e could have boxes of candy, or hearts  around the one affected. Finally, her R could be something along the lines of a giant wave of multicolored hearts. I know its not great, but anything for the excellent Riot KateyKhaos!{{champion:267}}
pwetty fishy :3
